subject: Re: [junit] Classes requiring input from the terminal
msgSnippet: ... Sure, your tests can read input from the terminal. But the general advice is: Don t do it. Make your tests fully automatic without any user interference or
messageBody:
On Mon, Apr 22, 2002 at 10:30:08PM -0700, Meraj Khan wrote:
>
> I was wondering if I could use junit for testing
> programs requiring input from the terminal.
> Please let me know.

Sure, your tests can read input from the terminal.

But the general advice is: Don't do it. Make your tests fully
automatic without any user interference or you will soon grow tired of
running them.

--
marko schulz
